property.name: subsampleCount
property.formula: (select count(*) from subsamples s where s.sample_id=sample_id)

property.name: imageCount
property.formula: (select count(*) from images i where (i.sample_id=sample_id AND i.subsample_id is null) OR (i.subsample_id IN (select ss.subsample_id from subsamples ss where ss.sample_id=sample_id)))

property.name: analysisCount
rockTypeName
property.formula: (select rt.rock_type from rock_type rt where rock_type_id = rt.rock_type_id)

property.name: firstRegion
property.formula: (SELECT min(r.name) FROM samples s, regions r, sample_regions sr WHERE s.sample_id = sample_id AND sr.sample_id = s.sample_id AND sr.region_id = r.region_id)

property.name: firstMetamorphicGrade
property.formula: (SELECT min(mg.name) FROM samples s, sample_metamorphic_grades smg, metamorphic_grades mg WHERE s.sample_id = sample_id AND smg.sample_id = s.sample_id AND mg.metamorphic_grade_id = smg.metamorphic_grade_id)

property.name: firstReference
property.formula: (SELECT min(r.name) FROM samples s, sample_reference sr, reference r WHERE s.sample_id = sample_id AND sr.sample_id = s.sample_id AND r.reference_id = sr.reference_id)

property.name: firstMineral
property.formula: (SELECT min(m.name) FROM samples s, sample_minerals sm, minerals m WHERE s.sample_id = sample_id AND sm.sample_id = s.sample_id AND m.mineral_id = sm.mineral_id)

filter.name: samplePublicOrUser
filter.condition: (user_id=:userId OR public_data='Y' OR :userId in (select pm.user_id from project_members pm where pm.project_id in (select ps.project_id from project_samples ps where ps.sample_id = sample_id)))
